title: Pink Floyd - The Wall Film Soundtrack "Fan Edit" 3 CDs (bo
description:
Tracklist:

01. Vera Lynn: The Little Boy That Santa Claus Forgot (1:43)
02. When The Tigers Broke Free Pt1 (3:09)
03. In The Flesh? (3:22)
04. The Thin Ice (2:40)

06. When The Tigers Broke Free Pt2 (2:11)
07. Goodbye Blue Sky (2:50)
08. The Happiest Days Of Our Lives (1:30)
09. Another Brick In The Wall Pt2 (3:15)
10. Mother (6:44)
11. Empty Spaces (1:59)
12. Young Lust (3:53)
13. One Of My Turns (4:43)
14. Don&#039;t Leave Me Now (3:08)
15. What Shall We Do Now? (3:23)
16. Another Brick In The Wall Pt3 (1:14)
17. Goodbye Cruel World (1:00)

CD2 (43:20)
01. Hey You (4:21)
02. Is There Anybody Out There? (2:44)
03. Nobody Home (4:19)

05. Bring The Boys Back Home (2:00)
06. Comfortably Numb (6:13)

09. Run Like Hell (2:28)

12. The Trial (6:24)
13. Outside The Wall (4:04)

CD3 "Spare Bricks" (50:18)
01. Another Brick In The Wall Pt 2 (1981 Single version) (3:52)
02. Goodbye Blue Sky (Off The Wall promo version) (2:26)
03. Young Lust (Italian single version) (3:59)
04. Run Like Hell (Off The Wall promo version) (4:42)
05. Bring The Boys Back Home (Film version) (1:27)
06. The Happiest Days of Our Lives (5.1) (1:57)
07. Another Brick In The Wall Pt2 (5.1) (3:27)
08. What Shall We Do Now (5.1) (3:37)
09. Don&#039;t Leave Me Now (5.1) (3:07)
10. Hey You (5.1) (4:29)
11. Comfortably Numb (5.1) (6:22)
12. Waiting For The Worms (5.1) (2:26)
13. The Trial (5.1) (5:29)
14. Vera Lynn: The Little Boy That Santa Claus Forgot (2:58)

Total Time: 2:23:41

Notes:
-The subtly overdubbed section of The Happiest Days Of Our Lives from the movie is edited in, but with the dialog severely reduced in volume.
-The edits from the film version of Another Brick In The Wall pt2 have been re-created using the CD, so there&#039;s no extra dialog in the second verse.
-The guitar overdubs in the solo couldn&#039;t be isolated, so the sound effects are still present during the solo.
-Empty Spaces is restored, using the CD version. It would have been places after Don&#039;t Leave Me Now, but the ending of the song doesn&#039;t really accommodate anything other than Young Lust.
-Young Lust has a portion of the cut introduction replaced. (The sound quality&#039;s a bit off, but it works pretty well.)
-What Shall We Do Now? has been moved in between Don&#039;t Leave Me Now and Another Brick pt3, the way it was on the &#039;Under Construction&#039; demo.
-The version of Hey You cut from the film has been included.
-Some of the sound effects in Is There Anybody Out There? have been reduced in volume.
-Bring The Boys Back Home is the extended film version, from the b-side of the When The Tigers Broke Free single.
-The Show Must Go On is restored, using the CD version.
-Some of the edits in Run Like Hell and Waiting For The Worms have been re-created using the CD version, so there&#039;s much less interference from the film sound effects.
-The &#039;Isn&#039;t this where ... we came in&#039; loop has been recreated using the quote from the DVD commentary. Works quite well!
-Also included: a disc&#039;s worth of bonus tracks, consisting of some single and promo mixes, and some interesting bits isolated from the DVD&#039;s 5.1 mix.

If you&#039;re interested in a more detailed list of the changes and sources, a cue / edit list for discs one and two are included.
